$comment: ROSIE Evidence Manifest Template. This file is part of a validation evidence package.
$comment-package_id: Format: OQ-SPEC-001-001-20250207T142315Z (tier, spec ID, ISO 8601 timestamp)
$comment-spec_id: The GxP specification ID this evidence validates (e.g., SPEC-001-001)
$comment-tier: Validation tier: IQ (Installation), OQ (Operational), or PQ (Performance)
$comment-traced_user_story: The user story this specification implements (e.g., US-001-001)
$comment-traced_requirement: The top-level requirement this traces to (e.g., REQ-001)
$comment-system_state_hash: SHA-256 hash of system_context.md to prove which system version was tested
$comment-git_commit: Git commit hash of the code that was validated
$comment-git_tag: Optional: Git tag marking this validated release
$comment-created_at: ISO 8601 timestamp when evidence package was generated
